text: Storm Jocelyn was a powerful windstorm that affected Northern Europe in January 2024. The storm was named by Met Éireann on 22 January 2024. https://www.metoffice.gov.uk/about-us/press-office/news/weather-and- climate/2024/storm-jocelyn-named In the United Kingdom and Ireland, yellow and orange wind warnings were issued due to very strong winds. https://www.metoffice.gov.uk/weather/warnings-and-advice/uk- warnings#?date=2024-01-23 Also the Netherlands, Germany, Poland, Denmark and Sweden issued warnings for high winds. https://www.metoffice.gov.uk/binaries/content/assets/metofficegovuk/pdf/weather/learn- about/uk-past-events/interesting/2024/2024_02_storms_isha_jocelyn.pdf The storm caused 1 fatality, a 73-year-old man on the Isle of Lewis, after his car crashed as a result of the storm. https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/news/scottish- news/storm-jocelyn-sees-pensioner-die-31953699 == Highest wind gust per country == Country Gust Location Cairngorms Brocken Tønder Vlissingen == References == Category:2024 in weather Category:January 2024 events
title: Storm Jocelyn
